item.title: 1620 Delano Venda Ronco v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 28, 2025

1620 Delano Venda Ronco v1.0 ETS2

It looks like you’re asking about a specific mod for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), the Mercedes-Benz 1620 “Venda Ronco”.
This is a popular truck mod within the Brazilian ETS2 community, known for its distinct “ronco” (which means “growl” or “roar” in Portuguese), a reference to its engine sound. The term “Venda Ronco” essentially means “growl sale,” implying that the mod is sold or available specifically for its unique engine sound.

Here’s a breakdown of what makes this mod and others like it popular:
Brazilian Truck Culture: Brazilian truck mods for ETS2 are famous for their realistic and highly detailed recreations of trucks common in Brazil. They often feature specific customizations, like unique bumpers, exhaust stacks (often called “boideiros” in the game), and detailed interiors.
The Engine Sound: The “ronco” is a huge part of the appeal. Modders go to great lengths to record and replicate the authentic sound of classic engines like the one in the Mercedes-Benz 1620. This makes the driving experience much more immersive for fans of Brazilian trucking.
Mod Customization: Like many ETS2 mods, the 1620 “Venda Ronco” usually comes with a wide range of customization options, including different chassis, engines, transmissions, interiors, paint jobs, and accessories. This allows players to personalize the truck to their liking.

Credits: RICO SILVA

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: 2025 GMC Sierra v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 28, 2025

2025 GMC Sierra v1.0 ETS2

The 2025 GMC Sierra lineup, which includes both the Sierra 1500 and the heavy-duty (HD) models, is largely a carryover from the previous model years. The Sierra 1500 received a significant refresh in 2022, and the HD models were updated in 2024, so the 2025 models feature only minor changes.

Key Features and Changes
Exterior: The most notable change for the 2025 models is the introduction of new 22-inch wheels on some trims. Otherwise, the exterior design, including the different grille designs for each trim, remains consistent with recent years.
Powertrain: The engine and transmission options are a direct carryover. The Sierra 1500 offers a range of choices:
A turbocharged 2.7L four-cylinder
Two V8 engines: a 5.3L V8 and a more powerful 6.2L V8
A 3.0L Duramax turbodiesel inline-six
The Sierra HD models continue to offer the 6.6L gasoline V8 and the 6.6L Duramax turbodiesel V8.
Towing and Payload: The 2025 Sierra 1500 maintains its maximum towing capacity of 13,200 pounds, but its maximum payload has been slightly increased to 2,530 pounds. The heavy-duty models remain highly capable, with the Sierra 3500 HD offering a maximum towing capacity of up to 36,000 pounds with the available Duramax diesel engine.
Technology: The interior technology is also carried over from the recent refresh. This includes a large 13.4-inch infotainment touchscreen with Google built-in software, as well as a 12.3-inch digital driver information display. Features like wireless Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, and available Super Cruise hands-free driver assistance are also available on higher trims.

Trim Levels and Pricing
The 2025 Sierra is available in a variety of cab configurations (Regular Cab, Double Cab, Crew Cab) and trim levels, from the work-ready Pro to the luxurious Denali Ultimate. The pricing can vary significantly depending on the trim, cab style, and optional packages you choose. The starting MSRP for the base Sierra 1500 Pro is around $40,495, while the heavy-duty models and higher-end trims, such as the Denali and AT4, can go well into the $70,000 range.
Pro: The base, no-frills work truck.
SLE/Elevation: Step up to more features and a more stylish exterior.
SLT: A blend of capability and premium features.
AT4: The off-road specialist with a factory lift and upgraded suspension.
AT4X: An even more capable off-road variant.
Denali: The traditional top-of-the-line luxury model.
Denali Ultimate: The most luxurious and tech-heavy trim, featuring premium materials and advanced driver-assist features.

Credits: ISRAEL

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Beyond Bosphorus v0.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 28, 2025

Beyond Bosphorus v0.1 ETS2

Beyond Bosphorus invites players on an immersive trucking journey through Thrace and the Çanakkale (Dardanelles) region of Turkey.

This initial release showcases:
Real-world locales such as Lapseki, Gelibolu (Gallipoli), Eceabat, Şarköy, Hoşköy, and Uçmakdere, all meticulously recreated to reflect their unique cultural and atmospheric qualities.
Atmospheric visuals that enhance the feeling of travel through these iconic regions.
Early narrative elements, including a basic character-driven interaction and environmental storytelling approach—introducing immersive dialogues and environmental details for the first time in the series.

Load Order:
Ai Vehicles
MapDef
Models
Models

Credits: Mapper&Modeller: Earl, Ali Hamza, Hakan Mappers: Lars, Hakan, Ali Hamza

SCS version !!!
